name: Grab The Cereal
description:
This is a game about cereal. This is a cereal about game. This game will ascend you. You will never be the same after this game. Every day, you will be craving to replay this game. You want to play all 6 endings, back to back. What is the game about? Well, maybe it's better for you to find out.

Ok fine, I'll explain it. This game is a choose your own adventure-ish game. You make choices that take you places. And it all starts between 2 boxes of cereal. Here's what reviewers have to say about it.

"After I played this game, I never went back to the internet again." - Billie McBobkins

"Grab The Cereal really is the Dark Souls of Anime Dating Sims." - Dweeb

"switch version when" - Nintendofan91

"this game would be perfect on the switch" - Nintendofan91

"please i beg u grab the cereal for nintendo switch" - Nintendofan91

"GRAB THE CEREAL 8 DELUXEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!1!" - Nintendofan91

"Huh." - IGN

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA" - Me

"It was made on freakin Twine." - everyone

"ok lmao" - Jim

"This is the #1 game about cereal." - Cereal Guy

Now what are you waiting for? Just go and play the game, it's free.  Also, it's only around 5 minutes, so we won't be wasting THAT much time.

Created by Nickitysplit.

This game was made on Twine.

lmao
